title: Bug 12590Returning the type when local var is selected breaks refactoring
OB: Bug 12590Returning the type when local var is selected breaks refactoring There seems to be a code resolve change: it returns the type if a local var isselected.This breaks refactoring: before I could select a local var and then rename itbut now I get a "Rename Type" wizard. It is no longer possible to rename a localvariable.
